pages.title: Blockscape Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce Blockscape, its purpose as a value-chain visualization tool

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the simple 2 HTML file structur (Viewer and Editor), client-side nature, and how the applications communicate via localStorage

pages.title: Key Concepts and Terminology
pages.purpose: Define core terms like map models, categories, items, tiles, dependencies, and the JSON schema structure

pages.title: Blockscape Visualizer (index.html)
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the main viewer index.html file , its architecture, and capabilities

pages.title: User Interface and Controls
pages.purpose: Document the UI layout, navigation tabs, toolbar buttons, and map model selector

pages.title: Model Loading and Management
pages.purpose: Explain how models are loaded from URLs, clipboard, files, direct JSON input, and share links; how the models array is managed

pages.title: Data Processing Pipeline
pages.purpose: Detail the parse() function, internal data structures (fwd, rev, seen, reusedLocal, index maps), and how raw JSON is transformed for rendering

pages.title: Tile Grid and Categories
pages.purpose: Explain how the tile grid is rendered, category organization, tile styling, and layout

pages.title: Dependency Visualization and Selection
pages.purpose: Document the selection system, dependency highlighting (blue/red borders), SVG overlay for links, and the drawLinks() function

pages.title: Drag-and-Drop Reordering
pages.purpose: Explain how tiles can be reordered within categories via drag-and-drop and how this updates the underlying JSON

pages.title: Visual Encoding System
pages.purpose: Document color schemes, badges (reused, external), visual indicators, and the LETTER_COLOR_MAP for generated logos

pages.title: Item Preview and Context Menu
pages.purpose: Explain the right-click preview system, iframe rendering with srcdoc, and how HTML item details are displayed

pages.title: Sharing and URL Encoding
pages.purpose: Document the share functionality, base64url encoding of models in URL hashes, and how shared models are loaded

pages.title: Blockscape JSON Editor (editor.html)
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the JSON editor application for creating and modifying models

pages.title: Editor User Interface
pages.purpose: Document the editor's layout, master list, detail panel, JSON textarea, and toolbar controls

pages.title: CRUD Operations
pages.purpose: Explain creating, reading, updating, and deleting categories and items, including the selection state system

pages.title: Drag-and-Drop in Editor
pages.purpose: Document the drag-and-drop system for reordering categories and moving items between categories

pages.title: Data Synchronization
pages.purpose: Explain bidirectional synchronization between the UI and JSON textarea, including debouncing and parseJSONString/toJSONString functions

pages.title: Validation System
pages.purpose: Document the validation rules, referential integrity checks, ID uniqueness validation, and error reporting

pages.title: File Operations
pages.purpose: Explain importing JSON files, downloading models, and the passthrough object for preserving unknown fields

pages.title: Inter-Application Communication
pages.purpose: Document the localStorage-based pattern for transferring models between Viewer and Editor using EDITOR_TRANSFER_KEY

pages.title: Data Model and JSON Schema
pages.purpose: Define the JSON schema structure for Blockscape models, including validation rules and field definitions

pages.title: Schema Structure
pages.purpose: Detail the hierarchical structure: Model → Categories → Items, required and optional fields, and the deps array

pages.title: Built-in Example Models
pages.purpose: Document the included models: Seed template, NFR quality attributes, deployment models, and user capabilities patterns

pages.title: AI-Assisted Model Generation
pages.purpose: Explain the model generation prompt template, constraints, validation checklist, and how to use AI to create new models

pages.title: Supporting Assets and Content
pages.purpose: Document logos, favicons, and the item preview content generation system

pages.title: Visual Assets
pages.purpose: Document the logos and favicons, their design, and how they're referenced in the application

pages.title: Item Preview Content System
pages.purpose: Explain how item detail pages are generated from Markdown using pandoc, the template structure, and the HTML rendering

pages.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
pages.purpose: Document the Cypress end-to-end testing infrastructure, test suites, and quality assurance approach

pages.title: Test Infrastructure and Configuration
pages.purpose: Explain Cypress configuration, test scripts, baseUrl setup, video/screenshot settings, and how to run tests
